    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomloose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="de">Verschiedene Waldformen im Vergleich</string>
            <string language="en">Different forest types in comparison</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La forêt différente saisit la comparaison</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A floresta diferente datilografa dentro a 
comparação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La foresta differente digita dentro il confronto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαφορετικοί δασικοί τύποι στη σύγκριση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Diverso bosque pulsa adentro la comparación</string>
          </title>
          <language>de</language>
          <description>
            <string language="de">Tropischer Regenwald, europäischer Mischwald und nordischer Nadelwald im Vergleich. In einer Tabelle sind u.a. Klima, Zustand, Artenzahl und Besonderheiten der Ökosysteme gegenübergestellt.</string>
            <string language="en">Tropical rainforest, European mixed forest and Nordic coniferous forest in tabular comparison, with regard of climate, condition, number of species and specific characteristics of each ecological system.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Wald</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Regenwald</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Mischwald</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Nadelwald</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Europa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Tropen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Forest</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Rain forest</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mixed woodland</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Coniferous forest</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Europe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Tropics</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>1</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Forêt tropicale tropicale, forêt mélangée 
européenne et forêt conifére nordique dans la comparaison 
tabulaire, avec le respect du climat, de la condition, du nombre 
d'espèces et des caractéristiques spécifiques de chaque 
système écologique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Floresta misturada a mais rainforest, européia 
tropical e floresta coniferous nordic na comparação tabular, com 
consideração do clima, da condição, do número da espécie e de 
características específicas de cada sistema ecological.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foresta mixed più rainforest e europea tropicale
e foresta conifera nordica nel confronto tabulare, con riguardo del 
clima, dello stato, del numero di specie e delle caratteristiche 
specifiche di ogni sistema ecologico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τροπικό τροπικό δάσος, ευρωπαϊκό μικτό δασικό και 
σκανδιναβικό κωνοφόρο δάσος στη συνοπτική σύγκριση, με το 
σεβασμό του κλίματος, του όρου, του αριθμού ειδών και των 
συγκεκριμένων χαρακτηριστικών κάθε οικολογικού συστήματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Bosque mezclado ma's rainforest, europeo tropical
y bosque conífero nórdico en la comparación tabular, con el respeto
del clima, de la condición, del número de la especie y de 
características específicas de cada sistema ecológico.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Forêt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Forêt tropicale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Régfion boisée mélangée</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Forêt conifére</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
